text: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَحۡبَارَهُمۡ وَرُهۡبَٰنَهُمۡ أَرۡبَابٗا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَسِيحَ ٱبۡنَ مَرۡيَمَ وَمَآ أُمِرُوٓاْ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَٰهٗا وَٰحِدٗاۖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

translation.en: They have taken their scholars and monks as lords besides Allah, and [also] the Messiah, the son of Mary. And they were not commanded except to worship one God; there is no deity except Him. Exalted is He above whatever they associate with Him
translation.id: Mereka menjadikan orang-orang alim (Yahudi) dan rahib-rahibnya (Nasrani) sebagai tuhan selain Allah,372) dan (juga) Al-Masih putra Maryam; padahal mereka hanya disuruh menyembah Tuhan Yang Maha Esa; tidak ada tuhan selain Dia. Mahasuci Dia dari apa yang mereka persekutukan
